body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       New: Celebrate the monumental release of the Homestead Quarter with your students! In addition to the February 10, 2015 launch event at Beatrice High School at 10 a.m., access lesson plans and activities to learn about this exciting quarter design. These plans, created by the U.S. Mint, are for grades 2-3 and grades 7-8. Homestead Curriculum Tired of all those paper folders with copies of lesson plans? Get rid of them! Homestead National Monument of America's K-12 curriculum guide is available on a flash drive! To get one, email Park Education Program Specialist Ramon Mangual  All of our units are available right here online. Download the entire curriculum unit or individual lesson plans. Either way, we've got you covered.
